cards.title: Manage your website
cards.description: Find out what makes a good accessible website including key pages and booking systems, and how you can develop and improve this digital channel.

cards.title: Improve your website user experience
cards.description: Find out how creating a good user experience (UX) can positively impact your business and get tips on improving your website's UX and accessibility.

cards.title: Manage your social media accounts
cards.description: Find out how to use social media to share information about your business and inspire people to come and visit you.

cards.title: Search engine optimisation guide
cards.description: Find out what search engine optimisation is and how to improve it on your tourism or event website.

cards.title: VisitScotland Business Essentials: Bitesize Webinars
cards.description: A series of short webinars to help your business with topics like search engine optimisation, travel distribution and user experience.

cards.title: Working with OTAs - visitor experience case study videos
cards.description: Discover how five different visitor experience businesses have benefited from working with online travel agents and using online booking systems.

cards.title: Tourism and events partner updates
cards.description: Keep up-to-date with news in the tourism and events industry with key information and opportunities available to your business.

cards.title: Using Food Tourism to Power Scotlandâ€™s Culinary Identity
cards.description: Join Erik Wolf - Executive Director of the World Food Travel Association - for a one-hour webinar exploring how food tourism can help your region stand out and thrive. Learn to turn local food culture into authentic visitor experiences that benefit businesses and communities alike.

cards.title: East Lothian Business Month: How to Grow Your Business Through the Travel Trade
cards.description: As part of East Lothian Business Month from 1st - 31st October, Visit East Lothian are hosting a workshop designed for tourism and hospitality businesses in East Lothian, with no previous experience with the travel trade.

cards.title: VisitScotland bitesize webinars: creating added value experiences
cards.description: Explore how thoughtful enhancements can generate greater returns through travel distribution. Unpack what added value really means, highlight ways to elevate your existing product, and show how to present experiences that appeal to partners and high-yield visitors.

cards.title: Adventure Together: On the Road - Scotland
cards.description: Organised adventure platform TourRadar are calling on tour operators and guides to join their marketing partnerships team for meaningful connections and invaluable networking opportunities. Plus, get insights into booking trends, and discover strategies and tools to grow your organized adventures business.
